summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeColourPop's Lippie Pencil is a long-lasting formula that glides on effortlessly to define lips and help prevent feathering. Super pigmented and creamy, this lip pencil can be worn alone or with your fave matching lip color.
details: DetailsBenefitsLong-lasting creamy formulaTug-free applicationCreates clean lines & prevents featheringPerfectly define or overline your poutSuper pigmentedEasy to sharpen with a standard pencil sharpener for precise applicationItem 2550460How To UseApply by following your natural lip line. For added coverage, you can fill your entire lips in with the pencil. Wear alone or with your fave ColourPop lip product.Pro Tip: Prime lips with ColourPop's Lippie Primer (sold separately) for smoother application.IngredientsDimethicone, Ceresin, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyethylene, Stearoxy Dimethicone, Silica, Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Mica (CI 77019), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
how_to_use: Apply by following your natural lip line. For added coverage, you can fill your entire lips in with the pencil. Wear alone or with your fave ColourPop lip product.Pro Tip: Prime lips with ColourPop's Lippie Primer (sold separately) for smoother application.

reviews.headline: My Ride or Die Lipliner üñ§
reviews.comments: This lipliner not only has a great formula and stays on my lips for a very long time, it is the PERFECT shade for me. I specifically use the shade "BFF". I use it under every lipstick, lipgloss, etc. (It's also great for over lining my lips)

reviews.headline: Love love
reviews.comments: Really creamy not drying but not tooo hydrated but just a good amount

reviews.headline: If You Have Money To Burn‚Ä¶
reviews.comments: I didn't realize this was one of those use and toss pencils! Ugh! No more use once that little tip is gone. No advancing, no sharpening‚Ä¶What a waste. Maybe 3 uses

reviews.headline: It's great but..
reviews.comments: its good but if it was twistable it would be GREAT!üéÄ‚ú®ü´∂üèºüòä

reviews.headline: ok
reviews.comments: I would like it but the packaging is horrible! The cap just pops off by itself! The color itself is ok but it goes down so fast you have to sharpen it. wear old clothes or a robe if you open this lip liner because the cap will pop open.

reviews.headline: Best of the best!!!
reviews.comments: Okay so the bff2 is my all time favorite lip liner color! It's the perfect rosy brown nude! Looks great on many skin colors. It's insanely comfortable, glides on so smoothly and effortlessly. The only thing I would change, is I would prefer it to be a roll up version, sharpening isn't the easiest. Regardless of sharpening, this is my top lip liner! Super inexpensive!!!!

reviews.headline: Came off immediately
reviews.comments: Color pretty and goes on well but one order of queso later and it was completely gone.

reviews.headline: Used to be my favorite
reviews.comments: I used to love this lip liner. The color and texture are still great but unfortunately, the quality has gone downhill. It doesn't last at all; as soon as I eat or drink something, it completely wears off. On top of that, the tip keeps breaking off, which means I'm constantly having to sharpen it and wasting a lot of product. Really disappointed because this used to be my go-to.

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: It didn't hold pigment it needs a stronger finish or bond to the skin

reviews.headline: Love the color and formula, hate the packaging
reviews.comments: Im currently using my second pencil in Oh Snap. I loved the color and formula enough to buy it again, but the packaging is an unfortunate situation. You have to use a particularly light touch to avoid breaking it and even then, it tends to still break early on. I havent yet tried sharpening mine. For the price, id still recommend this as this is the best color match ive found to my lips

reviews.headline: Amazing for overlining
reviews.comments: I used to use the nyx lipliners they were great but after the reformulation I started using colourpop. These lipliners have an amazing color and are creamy therefore they glide on amazingly. Unfortunatley with the type of pencil it is (Plastic casing) the lead comes out a lot easier which is such a bummer because it's so much product waste. I hope they fix this in the future otherwise it'd be 5/5‚≠êÔ∏è

reviews.comments: The too comes off to easy but really loce the pencil

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: Love the formula, goes on smoothly, and lasts. Oh Snap is my favorite!

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: I have been using this liner for a couple years, and I would recommend it to anyone. Great product!

reviews.headline: Unfortunate 1 star
reviews.comments: I actually love and enjoy the colors and formula of this lip pencil . Although The packaging makes it almost impossible to re use and sharpen. Pencil color falls out. You will be sharpening till there's no product left .

reviews.headline: Best lip liner
reviews.comments: my absolute fav and go to lip liner!!

reviews.headline: I will buy again and again
reviews.comments: It breaks off at times but overall still worth it, it lasts and the texture is great!

reviews.headline: Very creamy! love this color!
reviews.comments: I loved how smooth and creamy  all of the color pop products  have been.  Sharpens like a regular  pencil.

media.headline: Packaging Tricks - Not That Much Product
media.caption: Actual size of color, toothbrush for scale.

media.headline: I love this lip pencil. So pretty!
I will be buying more colors!

faceoff_positive.comments: I have been searching for the perfect nude lip liner for a really long time and was never satisfied because no matter what brand I tried they would either be way to dark or way to light. I came across this one when I was searching for a different one and I fell in love. It is my perfect nude shade and goes with so many of my lipsticks. I mostly wear varying nude shades, or light pinks and this goes with all of them. The point does dull pretty quickly, but with a quick sharpen it is ready for action once again. For the price you can't beat it. It is a super creamy formula and doesn't drag across your lips at all when you are applying. Also, if you don't want to wear lipstick you can go ahead and line your lips with this pencil and then fill them in with it. Then I use my finger to diffuse it a little bit. All the lip liners from Colourpop have such a great formula and I love all of them. I am so glad that Ulta carries this brand now.
faceoff_positive.headline: I would buy this lip liner again and again!

faceoff_negative.comments: Received this in the mail about a little over a week ago and tried it a few days after. Wore it for most of the day and evening with lip gloss over it, but when I took my makeup off that night my lips hap little bumps all over. The bumps were mostly on the outer edges of my lips where I applied the majority of the lippie pencil and then a few on the res rod my lip since I blended it out with my finger. I put a thick lip balm on hoping by morning they would be fine and they were worse. This time it hurt to even take big bites of food like my lips were sore or something.. The irritation and bumps on my lips took about a week to completely heal and go away on their own.. Its unfortunate this happened I have been excited to try these out and have heard nothing but good things about the product. Be careful if you have really sensitive skin..
faceoff_negative.headline: Allergic reaction to product
